biocontainers.name: njplot
biocontainers.summary: Njplot is a tool for visualizing binary trees such as the phylogenetic trees output from the phylip programs. available for several platforms including windows, macos, linux and solaris.

biotools.summary: NJplot is a tool for visualizing binary trees such as the phylogenetic trees output from the PHYLIP programs. Available for several platforms including Windows, MacOS, Linux and Solaris.

bioschemas.name: NJplot
bioschemas.summary: NJplot is a tool for visualizing binary trees such as the phylogenetic trees output from the PHYLIP programs. Available for several platforms including Windows, MacOS, Linux and Solaris.
